text:
@NYGovCuomo What are you thinking?!
Your policy decisions killed thousands in your state's nursing homes and then prevented loved ones from saying their final goodbyes... God Bless all COVID-19 Victims and their Families.
And now THIS?!
A cryptic poster that should read:
CUOMO OUT OF TOUCH https://t.co/zioAnZGVDX
